vsParam:
Sorel, here you are.
The medicine you need.

Thanks. I think this wound won't leave a scar now.
Uh, [px]... Sorry!

I insisted on comparing the power of alchemy and wizardry,
which is meaningless. I'm really sorry.

Wizardry and alchemy both have
their own advantages, so they're on a par.

Yeah, you're right!
They are both powerful!

Hey! Sorel has apologized, so stop
picking up the fight once again!

Hehe... Yeah. Let's go to the canteen
to stuff ourselves? My treat, as an apology.
Great~ I love you so much, So... Sorel...

Uh? What's wrong, Peppermint?
Your face looks like you see a terrible monster...

Sorel, what's wrong with your wound?
Ah, what if it leaves a scar!?

Ma... Majorum Sensei... Oh, here's the thing.
It's just a slight scratch...

Don't lie to me!
Ah, you were attacked by monsters?

Gosh, what should I use? The best
recovery wizardry, or my treasured panacea?

Ah haha... Sorel, you seem busy,
so I guess we should get going...

Hey, wait!
You can't take off at this moment!

Sorel, no worry!
I will heal you!

Now I'm going to use my best wizardry!
Even at the cost of my life!

Jesus——! That's not necessary!
I shouldn't have started this weird competition!
